html:
In the facilities of the Yarinacocha Amazonian Hospital, the delivery ceremony of 75 osteosynthesis was held for the area of ??traumatology and additive biomedical equipment; instruments that previously the hospital did not have and that now, thanks to the non-profit organization Scalpel At The Cross in coordination with the Regional Government of Ucayali, surgical interventions for complex fractures can be performed. It should be noted that these equipments may not be commercialized or used for profit, since the donation does not have that objective.

This donation was received by the regional manager of Social Development, as well as the executive director of the Yarinacocha Amazon Hospital, who mentioned that these teams will be very helpful since there will be no need to evacuate patients to the city of Lima, for his lack. Likewise, he reported that the Yarinense hospital has professionals in more specializations and that care today more than ever is provided in a comprehensive manner.

The head of the regional management of Social Development indicated that they will be constantly monitoring and supervising so that patient care is adequate and of quality. He also mentioned that they are in coordination so that surgical intervention campaigns can be carried out for people who are in poverty and extreme poverty.
